sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense>0</defense> <description>Anyone traveling outside the civilized planets of the galaxy should make a point of packing some form of hostile environment gear. Clothing for hot, desert environments often includes voluminous robes, goggles, headwraps, self-cooling packs, and water recyclers. Clothing for cold environments often consists of insulated parkas, quilted and layered pants, icegoggles, and head-gear.  Characters with this gear may ignore setback dice imposed by the environment they find themselves in. The gear must be appropriate to the environment at hand.   Models Include: Pretormin Environmental Froz350 and ScorSear 200 complete gear sets.</description> <encumbrance>2</encumbrance> <hard_points>1</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Adverse Environment Gear</name> <number>GEAR0001035</number> <price>500</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak>1</soak> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:30:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cdd9fe6c2f50a450e0f497eef699b691</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:32:27</sys_updated_on> <type>armor</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
